Annex II Acronyms and Defined Terms defines net-zero target: ‘Setting a net-zero target at the
level of an undertaking aligned with meeting societal climate goals means (1) achieving a scale of
value chain emissions reductions consistent with the depth of abatement at the point of reaching
global net-zero in 1.5˚C pathways, and (2) neutralising the impact of any residual emissions (after
approximately 90-95% of GHG emission reduction) by permanently removing an equivalent
